name: Bo's Adventure: Merging Islands
description:
Bo's Adventure: Merging Islands is the beginning to a story about our main character Bo.
Bo is a young man with the burn for adventure in his heart!
As he sets off on his journey he discovers a whole world full of problems...
An evil creature crashlanding on his planet...
2 Islands on the verge of colliding...
And what is up with this chicken?!?!
Help Bo discover his true power within...
Where it all started...
Bo's Adventure: Merging Islands
This game is rated for adults 18+
beware of dark humor, dirty jokes, and just all around inappropriateness!

A special thanks for The Brothers Gregory and Takeo Ishii for letting me use the Chicken Attack song for this game!
And Thank you REFMAP
I used for Some Map Layouts
and Characters
RPG Maker 2003 - Software engine used to make this game!

Bo starts his journey on the island of Greenville with his family.
When one day Bo decides he's going to go off on an adventure!
With his father's blessing and help from siblings Bo has no troubles setting off on his quest to travel the world of Ana-Tomy!

Along the way you will meet 3 companions who journey along with you to the end,
find a secret ninja hide out, have dinner with the queen, and battle in the arena!
But that's only the half of it....
